title: What makes you feel special? - Quora

response.answer_text: I talk to my mother daily around 10 PM. Yesterday I had night shift, from 10 PM to 6 AM. I was running out of time. So left my room in hurry. I also forgot my mobile at room. After completing my duty I reached room at 6:20 in morning. Exhausted I jumped on to my bed. Before sleep could take over, as a costumory ritual I took a glimpse of my mobile screen. 20 Missed calls. The text showed “Mom” . “Fuck. How could I forgot to talk to mom?” I quickly called back. Within two rings mom picked the call. I apologized for my negligence first. “So, mom you woke up quite early” I asked mischievously. “I didn't slept beta.” “Why mom?” I bumbled. “How could I sleep without talking to you” she replied.  What makes me feel special? My mother, every second. Love you Maa.  ASR.

Personnally, what makes me feel special is my best friend. She’s the family I’ve chosen and she’s always there to cheer me up and to remind me how unique and amazing I am. Anyone can feel special. Look for the things you like, for the people you love and cherish and who love you as much as you do, for a way to be proud of yourself. Maybe writing down your own story of your life will make you feel special. Because it will be a book only you can write since you’re the only one who have gone through everything you’re writing down. Have a nice day :)
